summary:
This is my second mod for Solstheim. It expands Skaal Village in different ways... 
You will find a lot more clutter around the whole town, including more lights, icicles, tables and a lot more.
descriptionHtml:
This is my second mod for Solstheim. It expands Skaal Village in different ways... 
You will find a lot more clutter around the whole town, including more lights, icicles, tables and a lot more. There is a small mine directly behind the smithy in which you will find some Stahlrim, iron and silver ore. Additionally you have your own house just a little bit outside Skaal Village, with an alchemy and an enchanting table. There is also a little creek flowing in front of your new home.

This file changes only a lot on the surface, it does not affect any gameplay mechanisms. The new mine was made lore friendly an is fully nav meshed, like your new house. There are no problems with other mods or incompability cases known (the file is also in Steam Workshop available). All storage containers are double checked with the focus on respawning issues. No other dlcs like Hearthfire or Dawnguard needed. 

For more informations just check the pictures, they will say more than this description. Or just give it a try. 

Thanks guys and enjoy... =D
author: Pipas - alias Holzkaeseloeffel
